A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to see light saber battles\, space battles that actually make sense\, a strong villain and a meaningfull plot.\n\nInstead we got gender wars\, a movie that pushes all kind of agendas I never had a problem with nor I'm interested in. This movie doesn't even deserve half a star\, but since RT doesn't count half stars\, here have one from me\, and that is way to generous for you Ryan and Kathleen. Please go away and never come back...
